review: Do not take! I am a healthy 27 year old female that had a bad case of oral thrush due to an antibiotic and instantly started experiencing side pain. I waited five days before experiencing pain excruciating  enough to make me chose childbirth over this pain. I went to urgent care and was diagnosed with gastritis because of this medication and it messed my liver up! Do not take!! There are better options!!!

Avoid!! Needed for a really bad oral thrush infection from antibiotics and ended up gastritis and liver problems! I am a health 27 year old female and have never had anything wrong with my liver, ever! I immediately stopped using once I started to endure side effects after 5 days of 2x daily. Please use other methods. I have never been in such pain in my life and had to go to urgent care!!
